title: Ornot UV Hoodie Comes in Two Colors and Men and Women
content:
Designed for long days spent outside, the Ornot UV Hoodie ($85) is a go-to for UV protection on year-round riding. Sewn in California from lightweight, recycled fabric, it balances performance with environmental responsibility. With UPF 30 sun protection, a bike-specific fit, and quick-drying Italian-made, Oeko-Tex approved recycled fabric and made in the USA. The UV Hoodie boasts UPF 30 sun protection to keep you protected and cool. The bike-specific tailoring and loose fit allow for optimal airflow. Store your sunglasses or other small essentials in the convenient rear pocket, which features a hidden Chris McNally sketchbook print.

Check it out in Mens and Womens at Ornot.
